title: "IBM's new microchip developed in Albany boosts artificial intelligence"
excerpt: "ALBANY - IBM unveiled a new high-powered computer chip developed in Albany that it says is the first-ever designed to efficiently use artificial intelligence to perform high-volume, complex tasks such as banking transactions while simultaneously scanning them for fraud - before the transactions are completed."
